law.text: The executive director of the Office of Vocational Rehabilitation may accept and use gifts made by will or otherwise for carrying out the purposes of KRS 151B.180 to 151B.210. Gifts made under such conditions as in the judgment of the executive director of the Office of Vocational Rehabilitation are proper and consistent with the provisions of KRS 151B.180 to 151B.210 may be so accepted and shall be held, invested, reinvested, and used in accordance with the provisions of KRS 151B.180 to 151B.210.
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 47, effective July 12, 2006. -- Repealed, reenacted, and amended as KRS 151B.210 by 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 470, sec. 41, effective July 1, 1990, which prevailed over an amendment to KRS 163.180 by 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 273, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 122, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 83, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 8, effective May 18, 1956.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/13/90). This section was amended by two 1990 Acts which are in conflict. Pursuant to KRS 446.250, the Act which was last enacted by the General Assembly prevails.
